price: "Em seguida, virá, depois disso, um ano; nele, os homens serão assistidos e nele, espremerão os frutos".
arabic: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika ʿāmun fīhi yughāthu al-nāsu wafīhi yaʿṣirūna
